channel.title: Uber r00t haxing
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Uber r00t haxing" - Drain stat information

item.title: Re: Uber r00t haxing
item.content:encoded:
Drain is an 'Attribute' not a Stat, so only things that specifically say "+X Drain" affect it. And you can't Recompile Drain.

Drain Edge:
Ally: Sporty Lvl 2: +1 Drain Edge
Ally: Tempest Kitsune: +1 Drain Edge
Item: Aromatic Grass: +1 Drain Edge
Temporary Boost: +2 Drain Edge (10,000 Core from Dimly Lit-Crumbling-Dealer's Room)

item.title: Uber r00t haxing
item.content:encoded:
Do permanents like the mark of 11DB affect drain? (ones that boost ALL stats)
Does recompiling affect drain as well?
Just curious.
Also, what perms/effects boost edge?
